metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20196 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is a stack-based buffer overflow in the third instance of the calculate_gain function in libfaad/sbr_hfadj.c in Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8. A crafted input will lead to a denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact because the S_M array is mishandled. It was discovered that Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 incorrectly handled certain mp4 files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: faad2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.8-3.2').
